Reviews.Title: Excellent laptop for small business
Reviews.Author: J. A. Sosa "Leo21"
Reviews.Content: This laptops has all I need in my office, it has a strong processor, enough memory to handle multiple aplications and enough HD capacity.I think it's a great deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Wrong laptop shipped
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: A totally different laptop was shipped to me whose characteristics were far less than the one I ordered. This is not serious.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-3317U Processor
Windows 7 Home Premium (64-bit), SP1
6GB DDR3 1600MHz memory 500GB HDD (5400 RPM, Serial ATA) with 32GB
14-Inch widescreen      1366x768 (HD), 16:9 aspect ratio, Supports 720p content
1-USB (3.0) port with USB Sleep and Charge, 2-USB (2.0) ports
ProductInfo.Name: Toshiba Satellite U845-S409 14-in Laptop Intel i5-3317U 6GB 500GB Windows 7 Home Premium
